title: 1.12.2饥饿改革mod配置问题
author: LawFeilong
txt_content: MC1.12.2的饥饿改革mod怎么通过修改配置文件去除食物携带数量的上限？现在的食物数量上限是原版的1/4甚至更少，能否将其数量上限更改为和原版一样？

replies.author: 番茄dada
replies.txt_content:
打开.minecratf/config/hungeroverhaul/目录下的HungerOverhaul.cfg
把141行 B:modifyFoodStackSize=ture   的ture改为false即可

replies.author: LawFeilong
replies.txt_content:
番茄dada 发表于 2018-7-30 18:45
打开.minecratf/config/hungeroverhaul/目录下的HungerOverhaul.cfg
把141行 B:modifyFoodStackSize=ture   ...
成功了，3Q
